summary: FRONT END VIBRATION AND STEERING WHEEL SHAKES AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  FEELS UNSAFE FO DRIVE. VEHICLE BROUGHT TO DEALER FOR REPAIR 7/16/01.  AGAIN ON 6/23/03.  PROBLEM CONTINUES TO PERSIST.  REQUESTING GM SATURN LOOK CLOSELY AT THE PROBLEM, PROVIDE GUIDANCE TO DEALERSHIPS, AND INTERVENE ON BEHALF OF VEHICLE OWNERS. RECALL AFFECTED VEHICLES.*AK
